mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_identity (member_identity_id, member_id, provider, provider_user_id, email_at_provider, created_at) VALUES (#{memberIdentityId}, #{memberId}, #{provider}, #{providerUserId}, #{emailAtProvider}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id, m.email, m.password_hash AS passwordHash, m.name, m.age, m.status FROM member_identity mi JOIN member m ON m.member_id = mi.member_id WHERE mi.provider = #{provider} AND mi.provider_user_id = #{providerUserId} LIMIT 1
